changeSet.author: lkovacic
changeSet.sql: create table feedback ( feedback_id int auto_increment primary key, feature varchar(50) not null, enabled tinyint(1) default 1 not null, constraint feedback_feature_uindex unique (feature) );

changeSet.author: lkovacic
changeSet.sql: create table feedback_user ( feedback_id int not null, user_id int not null, show_again tinyint(1) default 1 not null, primary key (user_id, feedback_id), constraint feedback_users_userid_fk foreign key (user_id) references users (userid), constraint feedback_user_feedback_feedback_id_fk foreign key (feedback_id) references feedback (feedback_id) );
